settings.text: Please select the country you are shipping to from the list below to find out delivery information. If you have any questions please contact us.

settings.title: United Kingdom Delivery
settings.answer:
- Standard Delivery (orders under £50): £3.50 (3-5 working days)
- Standard Delivery (orders over £50): FREE (3-5 working days)
- Next Working Day: £6.50

settings.title: Iceland, Bosnia & Serbia Delivery
settings.answer:
- Standard Delivery (orders under £75): £8.00 (up to 15 working days)
- Standard Delivery (orders under £75): FREE (up to 15 working days)
- Express Courier Delivery (orders under £75): £12.50 (up to 5 working days)

settings.title: Switzerland & Norway Delivery
settings.answer:
- Standard Delivery (orders under £100): £8.00 (up to 12 working days)
- Standard Delivery (orders under £100): FREE (up to 12 working days)
- Express Courier Delivery (orders under £75): £12.50 (up to 5 working days)

You may be charged local taxes (VAT) when your order arrives. For more information, please get in touch and check with us before ordering. Little Green Radicals are not responsible for any additional duties charged.

settings.title: Rest of EU Delivery
settings.answer:
- Standard Delivery (orders under £50): £6.00 (up to 10 working days)
- Standard Delivery (orders over £50): FREE (up to 10working days)

settings.title: USA Delivery
settings.answer:
- Courier Delivery (orders under £75): £9.50 (up to 7 working days)
- Courier Delivery (orders over £75): FREE (up to 7 working days)

settings.title: Canada Delivery
settings.answer:
- Express Courier Delivery: £15.00 (up to 7 working days)

You may be charged local taxes (VAT) when your order arrives. For more information, please get in touch and check with us before ordering. Little Green Radicals are not responsible for any additional duties charged.

settings.title: Australia Delivery
settings.answer: - Express Courier Delivery: £15.00 (up to 7 working days)

settings.title: Rest of World Delivery
settings.answer:
- Standard Delivery (orders under £100): £7.50 (up to 15 working days)
- Standard Delivery (orders under £100): FREE (up to 15 working days)
- Express Courier Delivery (orders under £75): £15.00 (up to 7 working days)

You may be charged local taxes (VAT) when your order arrives. For more information, please get in touch and check with us before ordering. Little Green Radicals are not responsible for any additional duties charged.

settings.text:
Thank you for ordering from us!

We have great confidence in our products and have many happy customers but we understand that sometimes buying on the internet is tricky and you may change your mind. You can return your order within 6 months of receiving your order (unused, with tags on and in the original packaging) for a full refund or exchange.

Please be aware that items purchased from our online or in-person sample sales cannot be returned or exchanged unless the item is faulty.

If your product is faulty please get in touch as we have a 365 day quality guarantee.

settings.title: United Kingdom
settings.answer:
Visit Royal Mail to view your parcel's journey using the tracking number on your order.
If you are returning your order from the UK please download our free postage form.

settings.title: Europe Returns
settings.answer:
To get a refund of your postage cost, please use a NON-TRACKED or ECONOMY POSTAL SERVICE (address below) and email us proof of postage and your order number. *Please note* we can only give a refund if a non-tracked service is used.

Returns Address:

Please send your parcel to our warehouse address:

Little Green Radicals c/o ILG
Yusen Logistics (Polska) DC4
Ul. Księdza Jerzego Popełuszki 17
55-080 Kąty Wrocławskie

settings.title: Rest Of World Returns
settings.answer:
Currently returns from outside the EU are at the customer’s own expenses.

Returns Address:

Please send your parcel to our warehouse address:

Little Green Radicals c/o ILG
Logistics House
Unit A Birches Industrial Estate
East Grinstead
RH19 1XZUK

settings.text: We pride ourselves on the quality of our Fairtrade and organic cotton clothing, but mistakes and faults occasionally happen and we want to make sure you are completely happy with your order. If for any reason you aren't, please get in touch with customerservice@littlegreenradicals.co.uk and send us a photo of the faulty item for a refund or an exchange.

settings.title: What size should I buy?
settings.answer: If you’re not quite sure which size is right for you, refer to our size guides. They’re located underneath the available sizes for each of our products.

settings.title: Can I cancel my order?
settings.answer:
We completely get it, we change our minds too! While we wish could, once an order is placed, we are unable to alter or cancel it at this time. We hope to have a cancellation window one day in the future.

Should the item(s) not work out, make sure to exchange for a preferred style or return for a refund. As a reminder, domestic return shipping is free.

settings.content: We use all major carriers, and local courier partners. You’ll be asked to select a delivery method during checkout.

settings.title: What is the shipping policy?
settings.answer: Once your order is placed, you will receive a confirmation email letting you know that our fulfillment team has received your order. Once your order is fulfilled, you will receive an email notification with your tracking information. Shipping fees are non-refundable in the case of returns.

settings.title: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout.

settings.text: Have questions about your order, or a general enquiry?
